mapper.select: SELECT * FROM work_view WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND work_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT work_tmp_name , work_start , work_end , work_shift , work_type , work_time , rest_time , cd1.common_detail_name AS shift_name , cd2.common_detail_name AS type_name FROM WORK_TMP w JOIN COMMON_DETAIL cd1 ON w.work_shift = cd1.common_detail_code JOIN COMMON_DETAIL cd2 ON w.work_type = cd2.common_detail_code
